attributes.action: Hold a vote of no confidence in the current UK Government.
attributes.additional_details:
Since the current government took power in 2015 it has been mired in scandal and its decisions have led to the public losing faith in their governance!

Some examples;

The off shore tax avoidance by senior MPs and their families while cutting services to the most vulnerable in society is morally wrong.
The failure to come to a satisfactory agreement with junior Drs leading to strike action.
The failure to protect British industry for wholesale sell off.
Wasting tax money on a EU leaflet.
attributes.background: In 2011 the coalition government changed the rules regarding calling a snap general election. One of the only ways to hold an early election is if a vote of no confidence is passed in Parliament.
